00033 // \cond
00034 // an interval before WDT will expire
00035 #if defined(AT91SAM7X256)
00036   typedef enum
00037   {
00038     WDT_INTERVAL_4    = 0xFFE,   // 4 ms
00039     WDT_INTERVAL_16   = 0xFFB,   // 16 ms
00040     WDT_INTERVAL_32   = 0xFF9,   // 32 ms
00041     WDT_INTERVAL_64   = 0xFEF,   // 64 ms
00042     WDT_INTERVAL_125  = 0xFDF,   // 125 ms
00043     WDT_INTERVAL_250  = 0xFBF,   // 250 ms
00044     WDT_INTERVAL_500  = 0xF7F,   // 500 ms
00045     WDT_INTERVAL_1000 = 0xEFF,   // 1 second
00046     WDT_INTERVAL_2000 = 0xDFF,   // 2 seconds
00047     WDT_INTERVAL_4000 = 0xBFF,   // 4 seconds
00048     WDT_INTERVAL_8000 = 0x7FF    // 8 seconds
00049   } HAL_WdtInterval_t;
00050 #elif defined(ATMEGA1281) || defined(ATMEGA2561) || defined(ATMEGA1284) || defined(AT90USB1287) || defined(ATMEGA128RFA1)
00051   typedef enum
00052   {
00053     WDT_INTERVAL_16   = 0x00,    // 16 ms
00054     WDT_INTERVAL_32   = 0x01,    // 32 ms
00055     WDT_INTERVAL_64   = 0x02,    // 64 ms
00056     WDT_INTERVAL_125  = 0x03,    // 125 ms
00057     WDT_INTERVAL_250  = 0x04,    // 250 ms
00058     WDT_INTERVAL_500  = 0x05,    // 500 ms
00059     WDT_INTERVAL_1000 = 0x06,    // 1 second
00060     WDT_INTERVAL_2000 = 0x07,    // 2 seconds
00061     WDT_INTERVAL_4000 = 0x20,    // 4 seconds
00062     WDT_INTERVAL_8000 = 0x21     // 8 seconds
00063   }HAL_WdtInterval_t;
00064 #endif
00065 // \endcond
